reasoning: ADEM is an acute post-infectious or post-vaccination demyelinating disease of the CNS. Global incidence estimated at 0.4-0.8 per 100k person-years, commonly affecting children and young adults. Point estimate 0.6 per 100k based on epidemiological surveys.
source: Schwarz S et al. (2001). Acute disseminated encephalomyelitis: a follow-up study of 40 adult patients. Neurology. 56(10):1313-1318
